abstract.t: IP addresses in the 232/8 (232.0.0.0 to 232.255.255.255) range aredesignated as source-specific multicast (SSM) destination addresses andare reserved for use by source-specific applications and protocols[IANA-ALLOCATION]. This document defines the semantics of source-specific multicast addresses and specifies the policies governing theiruse. It defines an extension to the Internet network service thatapplies to datagrams sent to SSM addresses and defines the hostextensions to support this service.Appendix I of this document describes changes to the Internet GroupManagement Protocol Version 3 (IGMPv3) [IGMPv3] to support source-specific multicast.
